body: Now, let's take this seriously, you're just making AMAs without any interest on them, your only intention is trolling or spamming in my opinion. Also, people are getting tired of having a whole page full of AMAs so please guys, stop.

title: Regarding AMAs

replies.body: For some people it's their 1st AMA... Laugh of Loud....

replies.body: +1 to this post. Like sure, if it's their "First" ama go ahead. But 3rd or 4th is just annoying...
